entry.content:
â€œPython å®ç°ç®€å• Web æœåŠ¡å™¨â€å®éªŒæŠ¥å‘Š

Python å®ç°ç®€å• Web æœåŠ¡å™¨

ä¸€ã€ä½œä¸šåç§°

Python å®ç°ç®€å•WebæœåŠ¡å™¨

äºŒã€å†…å®¹ä»‹ç»

æœ¬è¯¾ç¨‹å°†é€šè¿‡ä½¿ç”¨ Python è¯­è¨€å®ç°ä¸€ä¸ª Web æœåŠ¡å™¨ï¼Œæ¢ç´¢ HTTP åè®®å’Œ Web æœåŠ¡çš„åŸºæœ¬åŸç†ï¼ŒåŒæ—¶å­¦ä¹  Python å¦‚ä½•å®ç° Web æœåŠ¡è¯·æ±‚ã€å“åº”ã€é”™è¯¯å¤„ç†åŠ CGI åè®®ï¼Œæœ€åä¼šæ ¹æ®é¡¹ç›®éœ€æ±‚ä½¿ç”¨ Python é¢å‘å¯¹è±¡æ€è·¯å¯¹ä»£ç è¿›è¡Œé‡æ„ã€‚

ä¸‰ã€å®éªŒåŸç†åŠæ­¥éª¤

1.å®éªŒåŸç†ï¼š

ä¸€èˆ¬æˆ‘ä»¬çš„ web ç¨‹åºéƒ½è¿è¡Œåœ¨ TCP/IP åè®®ä¸Šï¼Œç¨‹åºä¹‹é—´ä½¿ç”¨ socket(å¥—æ¥å­—) è¿›è¡Œé€šä¿¡ï¼Œå®ƒèƒ½å¤Ÿè®©è®¡ç®—æœºä¹‹é—´çš„é€šä¿¡å°±åƒå†™æ–‡ä»¶å’Œè¯»æ–‡ä»¶ä¸€æ ·ç®€å•ã€‚ ä¸€ä¸ª tcp socket ç”±ä¸€ä¸ª IP åœ°å€å’Œç«¯å£å·ç»„æˆã€‚

a.IP åœ°å€æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ª 32 ä½çš„äºŒè¿›åˆ¶æ•°ï¼Œé€šå¸¸è¢«åˆ†å‰²ä¸º 4 ä¸ªâ€œ8 ä½äºŒè¿›åˆ¶æ•°â€,å†™æˆ 10 è¿›åˆ¶çš„å½¢å¼å°±æ˜¯æˆ‘ä»¬å¸¸è§çš„ 174.136.14.108ã€‚æˆ‘ä»¬é€šè¿‡ IP åœ°å€æ¥æ ‡è¯†æ‰€è¿æ¥çš„ä¸»æœºã€‚

b.ç«¯å£å·æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªèŒƒå›´åœ¨ 0-65535 ä¹‹é—´çš„æ•°å­—ï¼Œä¸€å°ä¸»æœºä¸Šå¯èƒ½åŒæ—¶æœ‰å¤šä¸ª socketsï¼Œå› æ­¤éœ€è¦ç«¯å£å·è¿›è¡Œæ ‡è¯†ã€‚ç«¯å£å· 0-1023 æ˜¯ä¿ç•™ç»™æ“ä½œç³»ç»Ÿä½¿ç”¨çš„ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨å‰©ä¸‹çš„ç«¯å£å·ã€‚ a.HTTP methodï¼šHTTP è¯·æ±‚æ–¹æ³•ã€‚æœ€å¸¸ç”¨çš„å°±æ˜¯ GET (æŠ“å–æ•°æ®)ä¸ POST (æ›´æ–°æ•°æ®æˆ–è€…ä¸Šä¼ æ–‡ä»¶) b.URLï¼šé€šå¸¸æ˜¯å®¢æˆ·ç«¯è¯·æ±‚çš„æ–‡ä»¶çš„è·¯å¾„ï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚ /research/experiments.htmlï¼Œ ä½†æ˜¯æ˜¯å¦å“åº”æ–‡ä»¶éƒ½æ˜¯ç”±æœåŠ¡å™¨å†³å®šçš„ã€‚ c.HTTP versionï¼šHTTP ç‰ˆæœ¬ã€‚é€šå¸¸æ˜¯ HTTP/1.0 æˆ– HTTP/1.1 d.header fieldï¼šHTTP å¤´çš„é”®å€¼å¯¹ï¼Œåšä¸€äº›åŸºæœ¬è®¾ç½®ï¼Œå°±åƒä¸‹é¢è¿™æ ·ï¼š

#å®¢æˆ·ç«¯æ¥å—çš„æ•°æ®ç±»å‹
Accept: text/html
#å®¢æˆ·ç«¯æ¥å—çš„è¯­è¨€
Accept-Language: en, fr
If-Modified-Since: 16-May-2005

copy

a.bodyï¼š ä¸€äº›ä¸è¯·æ±‚æœ‰å…³çš„è´Ÿè½½æ•°æ®ã€‚æ¯”å¦‚åœ¨ä¸€ä¸ªç½‘ç«™ç™»é™†çš„æ—¶å€™æäº¤ç™»é™†è¡¨å•ï¼Œé‚£è´Ÿè½½æ•°æ®å°±æ˜¯ä½ çš„è´¦å·ä¸å¯†ç ä¿¡æ¯ã€‚

2.å®éªŒæ­¥éª¤

a.æˆ‘ä»¬åœ¨åˆ›å»º web-server æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹ç”¨äºå­˜æ”¾ä»£ç æ–‡ä»¶ã€‚ç„¶åæˆ‘ä»¬é€‰æ‹© File->Open Workspace åˆ‡æ¢å·¥ä½œç©ºé—´ï¼Œé€‰æ‹© web-server ç›®å½•ï¼Œå¿…é¡»åˆ‡æ¢åˆ°è¯¥ç›®å½•ä¸‹ï¼Œå¦åˆ™è¯†åˆ«ä¸äº†é¡¹ç›®ã€‚æ¥ä¸‹æ¥æˆ‘ä»¬åˆ›å»ºæŒ‘æˆ˜ä¸€çš„ä»£ç æ–‡ä»¶ server.pyã€‚

#-*- coding:utf-8 -*-
from http.server import BaseHTTPRequestHandler, HTTPServer


class RequestHandler(BaseHTTPRequestHandler):
    â€˜â€™â€™å¤„ç†è¯·æ±‚å¹¶è¿”å›é¡µé¢â€™â€™â€™


<span class="hljs-comment"># é¡µé¢æ¨¡æ¿</span>
Page = <span class="hljs-string">'''\
    <html>
    <body>
    <p>Hello, web!</p>
    </body>
    </html>
'''</span>

<span class="hljs-comment"># å¤„ç†ä¸€ä¸ªGETè¯·æ±‚</span>
<span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title">do_GET</span>(<span class="hljs-params">self</span>):</span>
    self.send_response(<span class="hljs-number">200</span>)
    self.send_header(<span class="hljs-string">"Content-Type"</span>, <span class="hljs-string">"text/html"</span>)
    self.send_header(<span class="hljs-string">"Content-Length"</span>, <span class="hljs-built_in">str</span>(<span class="hljs-built_in">len</span>(self.Page)))
    self.end_headers()
    self.wfile.write(self.Page.encode(<span class="hljs-string">'utf-8'</span>))



if name == â€˜mainâ€˜:
    serverAddress = (â€˜â€™, 8080)
    server = HTTPServer(serverAddress, RequestHandler)
    server.serve_forever()

æ‰“å¼€ä¾§è¾¹å·¥å…·æ ï¼Œé€‰æ‹© Web æœåŠ¡è¿›è¡ŒæŸ¥çœ‹æµ‹è¯•. æ–¹ä¾¿èµ·è§ï¼Œåœ¨ web æœåŠ¡å™¨å¼€å¯çš„æƒ…å†µä¸‹ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬é‡æ–°å¼€ä¸€ä¸ªç»ˆç«¯çª—å£ï¼Œæœ¬å®éªŒå‡ä½¿ç”¨ httpie ä»£æ›¿æµè§ˆå™¨å‘é€è¯·æ±‚å¹¶åœ¨ç»ˆç«¯æ‰“å°å“åº”ä¿¡æ¯:

b.æ˜¾ç¤ºè¯·æ±‚çš„ä¿¡æ¯ æ•´ç†ä»£ç ï¼Œå…¶ä¸­ï¼Œsend_content ä¸ä¹‹å‰ do_GET å†…çš„ä»£ç ä¸€æ · è®¾è®¡é¡µé¢æ¨¡ç‰ˆ å®ç° create_page

c.å“åº”é™æ€é¡µé¢ åˆ›å»ºæ–°æ–‡ä»¶ plain.htmlï¼Œè¿™æ˜¯æµ‹è¯•ç”¨çš„é™æ€é¡µé¢:

import sys, os

ä¸ºæœåŠ¡å™¨ç¨‹åºå†™ä¸€ä¸ªå¼‚å¸¸ç±»:

 '''æœåŠ¡å™¨å†…éƒ¨é”™è¯¯'''
 pass

é‡å†™ do_GET å‡½æ•°ï¼Œé¦–å…ˆçœ‹å®Œæ•´è·¯å¾„çš„ä»£ç ï¼Œos.getcwd() æ˜¯å½“å‰çš„å·¥ä½œç›®å½•ï¼Œself.path ä¿å­˜äº†è¯·æ±‚çš„ç›¸å¯¹è·¯å¾„ï¼Œä¸è¦å¿˜äº† RequestHandler ç»§æ‰¿è‡ª BaseHTTPRequestHandlerï¼Œå®ƒå·²ç»å¸®æˆ‘ä»¬å°†è¯·æ±‚çš„ç›¸å¯¹è·¯å¾„ä¿å­˜åœ¨ self.path ä¸­äº†ã€‚ ä¿®æ”¹ handle_error ä¸ send_content å‡½æ•°ï¼Œå®Œæˆå®ç°æˆ‘ä»¬çš„é”™è¯¯å¤„ç†å‡½æ•°å¹¶è®¾è®¡é”™è¯¯é¡µé¢æ¨¡æ¿ã€‚

d.åœ¨æ ¹ url æ˜¾ç¤ºé¦–é¡µå†…å®¹ åœ¨ do_GET é‚£å†—é•¿çš„ if-elif-else åˆ¤æ–­é‡Œå†åŠ ä¸€ä¸ªåˆ¤æ–­è¯·æ±‚åœ°å€æ˜¯ä¸æ˜¯æ ¹åœ°å€çš„åˆ†æ”¯ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥æŠŠæ¯ä¸€ç§æƒ…å†µéƒ½å•ç‹¬å†™æˆä¸€ä¸ªæ¡ä»¶ç±»ã€‚ test æ–¹æ³•ç”¨æ¥åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦ç¬¦åˆè¯¥ç±»æŒ‡å®šçš„æ¡ä»¶ï¼Œact åˆ™æ˜¯ç¬¦åˆæ¡ä»¶æ—¶çš„å¤„ç†å‡½æ•°ã€‚å…¶ä¸­çš„ handler æ˜¯å¯¹ RequestHandler å®ä¾‹çš„å¼•ç”¨ï¼Œé€šè¿‡å®ƒï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å°±èƒ½è°ƒç”¨ handle_file è¿›è¡Œå“åº”ã€‚ ä»¬å¸Œæœ›æµè§ˆå™¨è®¿é—®æ ¹ url çš„æ—¶å€™èƒ½è¿”å›å·¥ä½œç›®å½•ä¸‹ index.html çš„å†…å®¹ï¼Œé‚£å°±éœ€è¦å†å¤šåŠ ä¸€ä¸ªæ¡ä»¶åˆ¤æ–­å•¦ã€‚ å†™ä¸€ä¸ªæ–°çš„æ¡ä»¶å¤„ç†ç±»ï¼ŒåŠ åˆ° Cases ä¸­ï¼Œåœ¨å·¥ä½œç›®å½•ä¸‹æ·»åŠ  index.html æ–‡ä»¶å¹¶æµ‹è¯•ã€‚

e.CGI åè®® åˆ›å»ºæ–°æ–‡ä»¶ time.pyï¼Œ åœ¨ server.py ä¸­æ–°å»ºä¸€ä¸ªå¤„ç†è„šæœ¬æ–‡ä»¶çš„æ¡ä»¶ç±»ï¼Œ åœ¨ server.py ä¸­å®ç°è¿è¡Œè„šæœ¬æ–‡ä»¶çš„å‡½æ•°ï¼Œæœ€ç»ˆåŠ åˆ°Casesä¸­æŸ¥çœ‹æ•ˆæœã€‚

å››ã€æºä»£ç 

#-*- coding:utf-8 -*-
import sys, os, subprocess
from http.server import BaseHTTPRequestHandler,HTTPServer
#-------------------------------------------------------------------------------


class ServerException(Exception):
    â€˜â€™â€™æœåŠ¡å™¨å†…éƒ¨é”™è¯¯â€™â€™â€™
    pass


#â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”-


class base_case(object):
    â€˜â€™â€™æ¡ä»¶å¤„ç†åŸºç±»â€™â€™â€™


<span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title">handle_file</span>(<span class="hljs-params">self, handler, full_path</span>):</span>
    <span class="hljs-keyword">try</span>:
        <span class="hljs-keyword">with</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">open</span>(full_path, <span class="hljs-string">'rb'</span>) <span class="hljs-keyword">as</span> reader:
            content = reader.read()
        handler.send_content(content)
    <span class="hljs-keyword">except</span> IOError <span class="hljs-keyword">as</span> msg:
        msg = <span class="hljs-string">"'{0}' cannot be read: {1}"</span>.<span class="hljs-built_in">format</span>(full_path, msg)
        handler.handle_error(msg)

<span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title">index_path</span>(<span class="hljs-params">self, handler</span>):</span>
    <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> os.path.join(handler.full_path, <span class="hljs-string">'index.html'</span>)

<span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title">test</span>(<span class="hljs-params">self, handler</span>):</span>
    <span class="hljs-keyword">assert</span> <span class="hljs-literal">False</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'Not implemented.'</span>

<span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title">act</span>(<span class="hljs-params">self, handler</span>):</span>
    <span class="hljs-keyword">assert</span> <span class="hljs-literal">False</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'Not implemented.'</span>



#â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”-


class case_no_file(base_case):

<span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title">test</span>(<span class="hljs-params">self, handler</span>):</span>
    <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">not</span> os.path.exists(handler.full_path)

<span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title">act</span>(<span class="hljs-params">self, handler</span>):</span>

#-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

class case_cgi_file(base_case):
    '''å¯æ‰§è¡Œè„šæœ¬'''

    def run_cgi(self, handler):
        data = subprocess.check_output(["python3", handler.full_path],shell=False)
        handler.send_content(data)

    def test(self, handler):
        return os.path.isfile(handler.full_path) and \
               handler.full_path.endswith('.py')

    def act(self, handler):
        self.run_cgi(handler)

#-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

class case_existing_file(base_case):
    '''æ–‡ä»¶å­˜åœ¨çš„æƒ…å†µ'''

    def test(self, handler):
        return os.path.isfile(handler.full_path)

    def act(self, handler):
        self.handle_file(handler, handler.full_path)

#-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

class case_directory_index_file(base_case):
    '''åœ¨æ ¹è·¯å¾„ä¸‹è¿”å›ä¸»é¡µæ–‡ä»¶'''

    def test(self, handler):
        return os.path.isdir(handler.full_path) and \
               os.path.isfile(self.index_path(handler))

    def act(self, handler):
        self.handle_file(handler, self.index_path(handler))

#-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

class case_always_fail(base_case):
    '''é»˜è®¤å¤„ç†'''

    def test(self, handler):
        return True

    def act(self, handler):
        raise ServerException("Unknown object '{0}'".format(handler.path))

copy
#-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

class RequestHandler(BaseHTTPRequestHandler):
    '''
    è¯·æ±‚è·¯å¾„åˆæ³•åˆ™è¿”å›ç›¸åº”å¤„ç†
    å¦åˆ™è¿”å›é”™è¯¯é¡µé¢
    '''

    Cases = [case_no_file(),
             case_cgi_file(),
             case_existing_file(),
             case_directory_index_file(),
             case_always_fail()]

    # é”™è¯¯é¡µé¢æ¨¡æ¿
    Error_Page = """\
        <html>
        <body>
        <h1>Error accessing {path}</h1>
        <p>{msg}</p>
        </body>
        </html>
        """

    def do_GET(self):
        try:

            # å¾—åˆ°å®Œæ•´çš„è¯·æ±‚è·¯å¾„
            self.full_path = os.getcwd() + self.path

            # éå†æ‰€æœ‰çš„æƒ…å†µå¹¶å¤„ç†
            for case in self.Cases:
                if case.test(self):
                    case.act(self)
                    break

        # å¤„ç†å¼‚å¸¸
        except Exception as msg:
            self.handle_error(msg)

    def handle_error(self, msg):
        content = self.Error_Page.format(path=self.path, msg=msg)
        self.send_content(content.encode("utf-8"), 404)

    # å‘é€æ•°æ®åˆ°å®¢æˆ·ç«¯
    def send_content(self, content, status=200):
        self.send_response(status)
        self.send_header("Content-type", "text/html")
        self.send_header("Content-Length", str(len(content)))
        self.end_headers()
        self.wfile.write(content)

#-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

if __name__ == '__main__':
    serverAddress = ('', 8080)
    server = HTTPServer(serverAddress, RequestHandler)
    server.serve_forever()
